Along 9-mile trail, a clam lover's paradise

As legend has it, the fried clam was invented in New England, and from the Clam Box in Ipswich to J.T. Farnham's in Essex, a portion of Route 133 boasts an unrivaled array of the delicious morsels. (Boston Globe)
